context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 2 features all working: 1) Real-time updates implemented via local state updates (setProducts, setCategories) after API calls - no fetchData() calls needed. 2) Multiple image upload uses input[type='file'][multiple] with handleMultipleImageUpload function. 3) Image gallery shows main image with 'Главное' badge, delete buttons appear on hover. 4) Catalog slideshow uses currentImageIndex state with prev/next navigation and thumbnail clicks.
